articles.title: Millie Bobby Brown to star in Netflix sci-fi movie directed by the Russo brothers
articles.description: Stranger Things star Millie Bobby Brown will star in a new Netflix film directed by the Russo brothers. The Electric State is a retro-futuristic sci-fi movie based on an illustrated book by Simon Stålenhag.
articles.content:
The Electric State is due to enter production later this year
Millie Bobby Brown at the Stranger Things season 4 premiere.
Photo by Roy Rochlin/Getty Images

articles.title: Has Netflix found its Bond? Ryan Gosling stars in spy movie 'The Gray Man' - Reuters.com
articles.description: In the new Netflix (NFLX.O) movie "The Gray Man," Ryan Gosling's character jokes that he goes by the name Six because 007 was taken.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES, July 19 (Reuters) - In the new Netflix (NFLX.O) movie "The Gray Man," Ryan Gosling's character jokes that he goes by the name Six because 007 was taken.
